WorkItem.Description:
Test (plain read/write):
----
$reader = PHPExcel_IOFactory::createReader('Excel5');
$excel = $reader->load('biff8.xls');
 
$writer = new PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5($excel);
$writer->save('write.xls');
 
Expected result:
----
Output is identical to input
 
Actual result:
----
Width of column A is slightly larger in output than in input.
 
Environment:
----
PHPExcel: Latest source from SVN (1.6.4+)
WorkItem.Summary: User-defined column width becomes slightly larger after read/write with Excel5
